revision.text: ==Navajo== ===Etymology=== {{nv-prefixes|3s|3o|∅}} {{nv-link-to-stem|-bizh|conclusive imperfective}} {{nv-link-to-root|-BIZH|braid}}. ===Verb=== {{head|nv|verb}} # he/she is [[braid#Verb|braid]]ing it, [[plait#Verb|plait]]ing it #: {{ux|nv|Shimá sání, shitsiiʼ shá nibizh, tʼáá shǫǫdí.|Grandmother, would you braid my hair, please?|inline=1}} ====Conjugation==== {{nv-paradigm|conclusive|∅/si}}. {{nv-verbtable|IMPERFECTIVE |yishbizh|yiibizh|deiibizh|nibizh|wohbizh|daahbizh|yibizh|deibizh|jibizh|dajibizh}} {{nv-verbtable|PERFECTIVE |shébizh|shiibizh|dashiibizh|shíníbizh|shoobizh|dashoobizh|yizhbizh|deizhbizh|jizhbizh|dajizhbizh}} {{nv-verbtable|FUTURE |deeshbish|diibish|dadiibish|dííbish|doohbish|dadoohbish|yidoobish|deidoobish|jidoobish|dazhdoobish}} ====Verbal stems==== * IMPERFECTIVE: -bizh * PERFECTIVE: -bizh * FUTURE: -bish * ITERATIVE: -bish * OPTATIVE: -bizh
